General.Name: Alturas Minerals Corp
General.Description: Alturas Minerals Corp., together with its subsidiaries, focuses on the exploration and development of mineral properties in Peru and Chile. It explores for copper-gold porphyry/skarn deposits and epithermal gold mineralized deposits. Alturas Minerals Corp. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 372 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2W9
